WorkItem.Description: If it isn't to late to add feedback :)   IDisposable pattern applied to applicable areas of the framework, i.e., ViewsCollection.RemoveAndNotify(items)
WorkItem.Summary: IDisposable pattern applied to applicable areas of the framework, i.e., ViewsCollection.RemoveAndNotify(items)

Comments.Message:
Hi,

For those interested in this topic, you might find helpful to know that, since the version 4.1 of the library, the SubscriptionToken class now implements the IDisposable interface. You can find more about this in the following work item:
 - SubscriptionToken should implement IDisposable (http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/workitem/7234)

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
